wathman aanaduwa udam anana lesa owunage nagarika sanwardhana kriyamarga swadhina ho sampradayika upaya upakrama upayogi karagaththak nowe eya siya balaya pathuruwa gath jathyanthara aayathana wala saha ehi aashawan matha padanamwa thanunu upaya upadrawa sahitha wu kriyamarga anugamanaya karannaki mema lipiya magin api shri lankawe nagarika dakma prathipaththiwalata saha kriyamargawalata harawima (2012) saha janathawa samruddhiya kara gena yama wenuwen aarthika awakashayan nawatha sakasima (2010 ) yana loka banku wartha deka pilibandawa wigrahayak karamu ehi rajyaye saha wishala goliya mulya aayathanawala ashawan owunage asamanathwa prathipaththinwalata sambandhawa deshapalanika madihathwim saha emagin wikalpa adahaswala
